entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Liverpool
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 p.m. ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Fog patches. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 15 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 15 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
